creator: norbert.reinhard@onlinehome.de
text:
After creating tables or lists in the editor "Kupu" can not save this.
It then comes to the following error message

Error saving your data.
Response status: 415.
Check your server log for more information. 

log4j.log:

SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: element "table" from
namespace "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" not allowed in this context
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "border" not
allowed at this point; ignored
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "cellpadding" not
allowed at this point; ignored
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "cellspacing" not
allowed at this point; ignored
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: unknown element "tbody" from
namespace "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: unfinished element
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: element "table" from
namespace "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" not allowed in this context
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "border" not
allowed at this point; ignored

allowed at this point; ignored

allowed at this point; ignored

SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "cellspacing" not
allowed at this point; ignored

SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: element "table" from
namespace "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" not allowed in this context
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "border" not
allowed at this point; ignored
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "cellpadding" not
allowed at this point; ignored
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: attribute "cellspacing" not
allowed at this point; ignored
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: unknown element "tbody" from
namespace "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
SocketListener0-8 ERROR lenya.publication - error: unfinished element

This is the same problem as the following bug:

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=45488

I have posted some comments there on how to resolve it.

HTH,
Scott

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 45488 ***
creator: scott.deakin@ntlworld.com
